titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Syracuse University men's basketball team for winning the 2003 NCAA Division I men's basketball national championship.
A resolution congratulating the Syracuse University men's basketball team for winning the 2003 NCAA Division I men's basketball national championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since being introduced in the Senate on April 9, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Congratulates the Syracuse University men's basketball team for winning the 2003 NCAA Division I men's basketball national championship. Invites the team and its players, coaches, and support staff to the United States Capitol Building to be honored and requests the President to invite them to the White House for an appropriate ceremony.
